name: Eclipse (itch) (atomicnitro)
description:
With day and night in your command, can you escape this ever-changing dungeon and defeat the Lord of the Tower?

Eclipse is a rogue-lite 2D procedurally-generated game. The time-controlling cowboy can change the time between day and night, allowing the change of inventory items, enemies and weapons to be affected.

Defeat the hoards of enemies in each dungeon, collect stat-boosting items and search for the final boss... only to die time after time and start again - with a new arsenal of weapons to choose from.
